timeline.bodyText: Correct. I noticed this in the testing as well. I think we should change the start order as well. Start the runner before starting pollers.
timeline.author: sagarkapare

timeline.message:
(CDAP-17124) Fix the PreviewRunnerService stop logic

- Shouldn’t try to stop a preview run that was already completed
- Stop individual preview runs before stopping the PreviewRunner, which the PreviewRunner runs shared services
